Elements Voice Series vol.4 Yuri Shiratori - Rainbow Harmony

name: Elements Voice Series vol.4 Yuri Shiratori - Rainbow Harmony
summary: Elements Voice Series vol.4: Yuri Shiratori - Rainbow Harmony (エレメントボイスシリーズ(4) 白鳥 由里 〜Rainbow Harmony〜) is a CD-ROM-based title for the Playdia console, featuring full motion video of Japanese pop idol Yuri Shiratori (白鳥 由里).
